languages.text: "Вы правы, с чувствами лучше покончить. Но Дому Орселлио и протекторату фон Валанциус пойдет на пользу династический союз. Что скажете? Станете моей дражайшей супругой?"

"You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"
languages.original_text: "Вы правы, с чувствами лучше покончить. Но Дому Орселлио и протекторату фон Валанциус пойдет на пользу династический союз. Что скажете? Станете моей дражайшей супругой?"

traits.locale_text: "You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

"You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

"You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

languages.text: “你说得没错，我们之间的感情确实是个负担。不过，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与奥赛罗家族依然可以从王朝之间的联盟中获益。你是怎么考虑的？你愿意成为我最亲爱的妻子吗？”
languages.original_text: "You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，我们之间的感情确实是个负担。不过，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与奥塞罗家族依然可以从王朝之间的联盟中获益。你是怎么考虑的？你愿意成为我最亲爱的妻子吗？”

languages.text: 「君の言う通りだ。私たちの気持ちが足枷になる。だがオーセリオ家とフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の提携は有益ではないだろうか。君はどう思う？我が最愛の妻になってくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

traits.locale_text: 「君の言う通りだ。私たちの気持ちが足枷になる。だがオーセリオ家とフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の提携は有益ではないだろうか。君はどう思う？我が最愛の妻になってくれないか？」

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Nos sentiments présentent un risque, mais la maison Orsellio et le protectorat von Valancius tireraient un avantage d'une alliance dynastique. Qu'en dites-vous ? Acceptez-vous de m'épouser ? »
languages.original_text: "You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Nos sentiments présentent un risque, mais la maison Orsellio et le protectorat von Valancius tireraient un avantage d'une alliance dynastique. Qu'en dites-vous ? Acceptez-vous de m'épouser ? »

languages.text: «Tiene razón. Nuestros sentimientos son un lastre. Pero a la casa Orsellio y el protectorado von Valancius les vendría bien una alianza dinástica, ¿no cree? ¿Aceptará convertirse en mi amada esposa?».
languages.original_text: "You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. Nuestros sentimientos son un lastre. Pero a la casa Orsellio y el protectorado von Valancius les vendría bien una alianza dinástica, ¿no cree? ¿Aceptará convertirse en mi amada esposa?».

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Unsere Gefühle sind eine Belastung. Aber Haus Orsellio und das Protektorat derer von Valancius könnten von einer dynastischen Allianz profitieren. Was sagt Ihr dazu? Seid Ihr bereit, meine treusorgende Gattin zu werden?"
languages.original_text: "You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Unsere Gefühle sind eine Belastung. Aber Haus Orsellio und das Protektorat derer von Valancius könnten von einer dynastischen Allianz profitieren. Was sagt Ihr dazu? Seid Ihr bereit, meine treusorgende Gattin zu werden?"

languages.text: "Haklısın. Duygularımız bize ayak bağı oluyor. Ancak Orsellio Hanesi'yle von Valancius protektorasının birleşimi, iki hanedanlık için de faydalı olmaz mı? Buna ne diyorsun? Sevgili eşim olmayı kabul ediyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "You are right. Our feelings are a liability. But House Orsellio and the von Valancius protectorate could benefit from a dynastic alliance. What say you to that? Will you agree to become my dearest wife?"
